name: Clarkshaws Brewery
description: We have plenty of bottles, cases and 5L minikegs of beer available. Delivery is free for these postcodes: SE5, SW9, SE1, SE11, SE15, SE17, SE21, SE22, SE24, SW2, SW4, SW8. Please select the Collect from Brewery option when checking out. Delivery is £15 to the rest of London. Minimum order £15.
safetyTips: Please get in contact with this supplier to find out safety measures they are taking.
